meanings.definition: The process of removing minerals from something.
meanings.sent1: The demineralizations in the water treatment plant ensure safe drinking water.
meanings.sent2: The demineralizations of the soil led to poor crop growth.
meanings.sent3: The demineralizations of the rock made it look like Swiss cheese.
meanings.sent4: Her demineralizations of the jewelry box revealed hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The demineralizations of the bone weakened its structure.

meanings.definition: The state of having minerals removed.
meanings.sent1: The demineralizations in her diet caused health issues.
meanings.sent2: The demineralizations of the tooth enamel resulted in cavities.
meanings.sent3: His demineralizations of the mineral collection left it dull and uninteresting.
meanings.sent4: The demineralizations of the landscape left it barren and lifeless.
meanings.sent5: The demineralizations of the ocean water affected marine life.
